block.p: GOTTLIEB - Samuel. Beloved companion of Jacqueline Salmon. Devoted husband of the late Iris for 44 years. Survived by children, Leda, Jordan and Linda. Adored grandfather of Rachel, Jacob and Elizabeth. Sam was the eleventh of thirteen children and will be missed by Eva, David, Rose, Ida, Murray, Jack, Mitzi, Ansel and Jacqueline Salmon's family and their friends. Graveside services Thursday, 2:30 PM, at New Montefiore Cemetery, Pinelawn, LI.
